content.rendered:
PRO servicesUAE

Home

PRO Services in Dubai, UAE

The abbreviation PRO stands for Public Relations Officer. Every company needs a PRO to help interface with Government agencies and get the relevant paperwork done.

A Public Relations Officer can help you out with the following
  • Share Transfer
  • Renewal of Business License
  • Adding new Business Activities when the company wishes to expand its operations
  • Formally withdrawing from Business Activities when the company scales down its operations
  • Amending the Business License as required
  • Investor Visa
  • Residence Visa
  • Work Visa
  • Family Visa
  • Cancellation of Visa
  • Securing New Labor Card(s)
  • Emirates ID
  • Chamber of Commerce registration
  • Getting a Customs Client Code
  • Import-Export License
  • Leasing or purchasing new property
  • Ejari Certificate
  • Getting a PO Box Number, as well as subsequent Renewal
  • Assistance with Opening Corporate and Personal Bank Accounts
  • Health insurance
  • Life Insurance
  • Property Insurance
  • Driving License
  • Company Vehicle Registration
  • Digital Signature
  • Memorandum of Understanding
  • Power of Attorney documentation
  • Legal Translation of Documents
  • Notarization of Documents
  • Attestation of Documents
  • Opening a Branch Office
  • Trademark Registration
  • Getting a New Business License when needed
  • New Company Formation

This list is in no way exhaustive. It helps greatly if you have an experienced PRO on your side, and that is where we come in. Our PRO experts have years of experience in Immigration and UAE Labor Law; as well as in-depth knowledge of Government procedures, so we can get your work done for you in the shortest timeframe possible. Our clients span multiple business verticals, and we also have access to a strong dedicated legal team to ensure that everything is done the way it should be.

Because some of the paperwork and documentation will be in Arabic, you will need someone who is well-versed in the language. We can help you liaison with the Department of Economic Development, Ministry of Labor, Department of Immigration and Naturalization, Dubai Courts, General Directorate of Residency and Foreigners Affairs, Roads and Transport Authority, Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry, UAE Embassies in various countries worldwide, foreign Embassies in the United Arab Emirates, and more.

You can choose to have an in-house Public Relations Officer or outsource it to a specialized business services provider which will prove to be the more cost-effective option. If you choose a PRO services provider, you are freed from the hassle of finding a PRO for your business. You can also benefit from the vast expertise of the PRO services provider, which comprises of not one, but several professionals engaged in PRO services.

Why Choose A&A Associate LLC For PRO Services?

One of the functions of a PRO is to stay updated of changes in the law, so that he/she can prevent the company from falling short of the legal requirements and incurring heavy penalties in the process.

A&A Associate LLC has a team of legal experts who work in close tandem with PRO professionals to ensure that all its clients are always on the right side of the law. This way, we see to it that our clients are spared of fines and late fees. Our services are completely transparent. We let you know in advance exactly how much you should be paying as various charges to different Government agencies, and provide you with receipts for the same, if you choose to have us as your PRO services provider. We follow up on all documentation filed with the authorities and do not rest until you are in possession of all approvals and clearances that are needed to run your business smoothly. To make things easy for you, we pick up and drop documents at your convenience.

If you would like to know more about our PRO services, please get in touch.

Why Us?

Customised Solutions
Experienced Consultants
Hassle-Free Procedure
Multiple Payment Options
